```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(ggBoxplot2d)
```


```{r mtcars1}
data(mtcars)
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, group = factor(cyl), color = factor(cyl), fill = factor(cyl))) +
	geom_boxplot2d() +
	theme(legend.position = 'bottom')
p
```
